---
title: "Climate Trends"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
climate <- read.csv("data/climate_clean.csv")
```

```{r}
climate_nat <- climate %>%
  group_by(Year) %>%
  summarize(MeanTemp = mean(Temp, na.rm = TRUE))

ggplot(climate_nat, aes(Year, MeanTemp)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(
    title = "Average U.S. Temperature Over Time",
    x = "Year",
    y = "Temperature"
  )
```

```{r}
ggplot(climate, aes(Year, Temp, group = State)) +
  geom_line(alpha = 0.2) +
  labs(
    title = "Temperature Trends by State",
    x = "Year",
    y = "Temperature"
  )
```
